verbs.description: outscold (third-person singular simple present outscolds, present participle outscolding, simple past and past participle outscolded)

examples: And as to singers, I am certain that one of them goes as high as Catalani: I never heard any thing to equal it except a friend of mine who went into hysterics because she was outscolded by her husband. She, I think, did scream louder.
